field.name: summary
field.value: directive to check if component is registered

field.name: description
field.value:
<?define X?> is used for conditional component declaration. it would be useful if there'd be a way to determine if component is not already registered inside <?if !COMPONENT.REGISTERED ?> directive.
i.e. <?if !componentId ?><component id="componentId" type="type"/><?end?>
this will make configuration easier to customize for different scenarios
